Player History
Injured on 6/21/1967 with a Spasms Back, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 5/5/1970 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Released by St. Louis on 4/1/1971...
Drafted in 7th round, 126th overall pick, by Los Angeles in 1975...
Traded from Los Angeles to Chicago (N) on 2/10/1975 (Going to CHC: P W. Remmerswaal. Going to LA: P M. Clear, P C. Speck)...
Injured on 5/9/1977 with a Torn Ligament Elbow, out for full season...
Released by Chicago (N) on 8/22/1983...
Drafted in 1st round, 13th overall pick, by Cincinnati in 1985...
Traded from Cincinnati to Los Angeles on 2/10/1985 (Going to LA: P J. Wetteland, P T. Crews, C T. Munson, P S. Rogers. Going to CIN: 3B J. Mumphrey, DH K. Moreland, LF B. Downing)...
Injured on 7/16/1987 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for 8-9 weeks...
Injured on 4/23/1989 with a Ruptured Bicep Tendon, out for 3 weeks...
Earned first career win on 4/23/1989...
Injured on 6/7/1989 with a Strained Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Was selected to the 1994 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 2/3/1995 to a 5-year deal worth $7,000,000 per year...
Was selected to the 1995 Allstar game...
